Reviews.Title: Very Good!
Reviews.Author: Alexandre Augusto Simionato
Reviews.Content: This device is wonderful! It exceeded my expectations, with sharps photos and HD resolution. I recommend to all those looking for a something more when it comes to the art of photography.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Berkley Bossard
Reviews.Content: Item arrived as stated with no damage or problems. We are still learning all the features with this camera so far the pictures are clear and very good. I feel buying this kit I saved hundreds of dollars. Also this was my x-mas gift to my wife. Needless to say I hit a home run.

ProductInfo.Features:
Kit Includes 13 Products -- All Brand New with Manufacturer supplied accessories, and Warranty:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II and Canon 75-300mm III Zoom Lens + Transcend 32 GB Class 10 SD Card
LP-E8 High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery Pack + 2 Zeikos 58mm UV Filters
SDHC Card Reader + Large Camera Bag + Memory Card Wallet + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit
Screen Protector + 50-Inch Tripod --- Exclusive by TheImagingWorld
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II + Canon EF 75-300mm III Autofocus Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + 2 Filters + Tripod + Accessory Kit
